body.p: Empty cartouches, as they occur in Ptolemaic and Roman texts, are transliterated with 3 underscores: "___" and are lemmatized with lemma ID (WCN) 550225.
NOTE: Do not use this for damages or erased cartouches, e.g. Akhenaten's cartouche being erased.
Blank parts of a text that were intended for a later addition of a personal name and titles (e.g. on a coffin), are marked as descriptive information between "#", see .
